promptPrefix:
Your task is to create a product description with these instructions:
2) 2, 3, 4 or 5  paragraphs with the headings <h3> <h4>  and <h5> with the benefits of the product.
3)Create a bullet point <ul> list with the most important futures and a heading in <h5>. 

The description should be written in HTML.
All output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE].

Now I will give you the text to examine and create the product description:

[PROMPT]
title: <HTML> Product Description
